mapper.select: SELECT A.DEPT_CODE, A.DEPT_NM, A.USER_ID, A.USER_NM, B.AUTHOR_CODE, A.ESNTL_ID, (CASE WHEN B.SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END) AS REG_YN FROM (SELECT A.ORGNZT_ID DEPT_CODE, A.ORGNZT_NM DEPT_NM, B.EMPLYR_ID USER_ID, B.USER_NM USER_NM, B.ESNTL_ID FROM TN_ORGNZTINFO A, TN_EMPLYRINFO B WHERE A.ORGNZT_ID = B.ORGNZT_ID AND A.ORGNZT_ID = #{deptCode}) A LEFT OUTER JOIN TN_EMPLYRSCRTYESTBS B ON A.ESNTL_ID = B.SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID WHERE 1 = 1 LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
